href.description: URL serving as reference for the attachment resource

description.description: A narrative text describing the content of the attachment

atReferredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.

atSchemaLocation.description: A URI to a JSON-Schema file that defines additional attributes and relationships

atBaseType.description: When sub-classing, this defines the super-class

tmForumType.description: When sub-classing, this defines the sub-class entity name

description: Attachment reference. An attachment complements the description of an element (for instance a product) through video, pictures
title: AttachmentRef
